long_description: With a few inches of extra width, the REI Comfort Lounger XL chair provides spacious luxury and complete adjustability, from fully upright to fully reclined. Quick-drying, breathable mesh fabric and ripstop polyester fabric are suspended from the frame with high-tension elastic cord, for the utmost in outdoor comfort. Mesh fabric provides soft yet firm support and will not collect water during an afternoon rain shower. Headrest and lumbar pads slide up and down, allowing you to customize your comfort; pads are attached to the chair so they won't get lost. Steel frame is strong and durable; powder coating and stainless hardware resist rust and corrosion and keep the frame looking nice for years of use. REI Comfort Lounger XL chair has a capacity of 325 lbs.
